item.title: We're celebrating OpenStreetMap's 18th Anniversary! #OpenStreetMap18 https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2022/08/06/happy-18th-anniversary-openstreetmap/ Cake by @osmbd@twitter.com :)

Open Social Media at OpenStreetMap: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2022/06/28/open-social-media-at-openstreetmap/ The OSMF is pleased to financially support the https://en.osm.town mastodon service (It's like twitter but on open internet protocols)

@OpenStreetMapPL@twitter.com @osmafrica@twitter.com If you want to request a new category for your #OSM community, you can find out more at https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/about-the-new-category-requests-category/1001

Welcome to the first four @OpenStreetMap@twitter.com communities to create their own spaces on the OSM Community Forum! üá≥üá± üáπüáº üáµüá± üåç https://community.openstreetmap.org/c/communities/9 @OpenStreetMapPL@twitter.com #OSMTaiwan #OSMNetherlands @osmafrica@twitter.com

The #OpenStreetMap Foundation is running a survey (in 13 languages!) to find out more about the #OSM community. It should only take a few minutes, and we'd greatly appreciate as many responses as possible., üôÇ (pls boost) https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2021/01/18/community-survey/

Submit your OpenStreetMap poster! Up to 20 posters will be showcased on the @sotm website and elsewhere. Deadline: 30 June 2020. Read more: EN https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/05/21/state-of-the-map-2020-call-for-posters/ ES https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/05/26/state-of-the-map-2020-convocatoria-de-posters/?lang=es PL https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/05/22/state-of-the-map-2020-zaproszenie-do-przesylania-plakatow/?lang=pl PT-BR https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/05/25/state-of-the-map-2020-convocacao-para-envio-de-posteres/?lang=pt-br

The call for microgrant applications is now also available in: FR https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/04/20/annonce-de-lappel-a-candidatures-de-micro-subventions-de-la-fondation-osm/?lang=fr IT https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/04/26/comunicazione-di-apertura-delle-applicazioni-per-microgrant-della-osm-foundation/?lang=it SQ https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/04/23/shpallja-e-thirrjes-se-fondacionit-osm-per-aplikime-rreth-granteve-te-vogla/?lang=sq Thanks to the volunteer translators :) @OSM_FR @ProjetEOF @WikimediaItalia @Osm_Albaniahttps://twitter.com/openstreetmap/status/1251899733641175042

The OSM Foundation‚Äôs call for microgrant applications is now open. Find out how to apply: EN https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/04/19/announcing-the-osm-foundations-call-for-microgrant-applications/ ES https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/04/18/anuncio-de-llamado-de-la-fundacion-osm-a-postulaciones-de-microdonaciones/?lang=es PL https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/04/19/oglaszamy-otwarcie-okresu-skladania-wnioskow-o-mikrogranty-fundacji-osm/?lang=pl PT-BR https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/04/19/anuncio-da-convocacao-da-fundacao-osm-para-pedido-de-microcredito/?lang=pt-br Final day for submissions: May 10, 2020.

Thanks to our new tile cache and domain name sponsors! EN https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/04/10/thanks-to-our-new-tile-cache-and-domain-name-sponsors/ ES https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/04/11/gracias-a-nuestros-nuevos-patrocinadores-de-cache-de-teselas-y-nombre-de-dominio/?lang=es PL https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/04/10/podziekowania-dla-nowych-sponsorow-domen-i-serwerow-cache/?lang=pl @osm_tech

What are your thoughts on having the option to apply for OSM Foundation membership based on sizeable contribution to the project? Please read the proposal and comment using your preferred method from the ones listed :) EN: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/04/04/request-for-feedback-on-proposal-for-osmf-membership-based-on-sizeable-contribution-to-the-project/ ES: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/04/05/solicitud-de-retroalimentacion-sobre-la-propuesta-para-la-membresia-fosm-basada-en-una-contribucion-significativa-al-proyecto/?lang=es

State of the Map 2020 @sotm will be a virtual conference: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/03/27/sotm-2020-will-be-a-virtual-conference/ DE: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/03/27/sotm-2020-dieses-jahr-virtuell/?lang=de FR: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/03/27/le-sotm-2020-va-etre-virtuel/?lang=fr

"People who transport food, medicine, and other supplies still need to move and they are highly dependent on maps. You can help them by improving the map in your local area" https://twitter.com/TheMissingMaps/status/1243113258527186948
Call for more featured tile layers on https://openstreetmap.org/¬† See how you can help: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/03/24/call-for-more-featured-tile-layers-on-osm-org/

Thanks to anyone who identifies as a woman for their contribution to the OpenStreetMap project - be it map data, code, organising mapathons, advocacy or other :) OpenStreetMap and International Women's Day: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/03/08/openstreetmap-and-international-womens-day/

Many data visualisations for #coronavirus use an OpenStreetMap basemap of course. Example: https://coronavirus.app/?mode=infected But there's also been an uptick in OpenStreetMap contributions adding map details in the worst affected areas:https://twitter.com/jeffdefacto/status/1235066401745817600

Congratulations to @weeklyOSM for publishing its 500th newsletter! WeeklyOSM is a volunteer community project, sharing OpenStreetMap news every week in several languages :) https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/02/26/congratulations-to-weeklyosm-for-publishing-its-500th-newsletter/
Mapathon at @uchicago 's Tobler Society. Students started the first Chapter of @YouthMappers in Chicago last year.
Are you interested to join the Microgrants Committee..? Read more at https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/02/17/call-for-microgrants-committee/ and apply by March 8th, 2020.
